description: This file defines a GlobalExceptionHandler class using Spring Boot annotations. It provides centralized handling for various exceptions in a web controller, returning structured error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller advice class that handles exceptions globally, providing standardized HTTP error responses.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Constructs a standardized error response map with timestamp, status, error, and message.

methods.name: handleBadCreds
methods.description: Handles BadCredentialsException by returning a 401 UNAUTHORIZED response.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles UsernameNotFoundException by returning a 401 UNAUTHORIZED response with an 'Invalid credentials' message.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException by returning validation error details, including specific field errors.

methods.name: handleConstraintViolation
methods.description: Handles ConstraintViolationException, returning details of property path violations.

methods.name: handleTypeMismatch
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException, indicating which parameter has an invalid value.

methods.name: handleMissingParam
methods.description: Handles MissingServletRequestParameterException, indicating which parameter is missing.

methods.name: handleIllegalArg
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentException by returning a bad request response with the exception message.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other Exceptions, returning an internal server error with a generic message.
